title: Deatta Toki Kara, Koi Deshita.
alternative_title: Deatta Toki kara, Koi deshita. ; 出会った時から、恋でした。
status: Deatta Toki kara, Koi deshita. ; 出会った時から、恋でした。
description:
Description :
        A collection of 4 short stories about the purity of different kinds of love !

- High school festival, a love story between a high school girl and her kohai.
- A school trip for a club and two club members getting close.
- A romance between a high school girl and an older colleague she met at her part-time job.
- A complex love story between a young girl and her brother's friend.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4: Should I Keep This Love At First Sight Going ?
